postReview.title: Leicester City 2-2 Brighton: Late Foxes fightback thwarts Seagulls
postReview.description: Leicester City left it late at the King Power Stadium, but struck twice to rescue a point against Brighton.

QAData.question: Who won between Leicester City and Brighton & Hove Albion on Sun, 08 Dec 2024 14:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Leicester City vs Brighton & Hove Albion on Sun, 08 Dec 2024 14:00:00 GMT ended in a 2–2 tie.

funFacts.fallback: Conor Coady completed the most passes (83) in the match.
Jamie Vardy was Player of the Match with a rating of 8.2.
Jamie Vardy has the least touches (24) of any outfield player.
Wilfred Ndidi is the most accurate passer (96%) in the match.
Igor Julio made an error that led to a goal for Leicester City.
Kaoru Mitoma created the most chances (3) in the match.
Kaoru Mitoma lost the most duels (10) in the match.
Boubakary Soumaré won the most duels (9) in the match.
